titleStmt.title: A Touch of the times, or, Two letters casually intercepted the first, from the author of a late pamplet intituled, Day-fatality, to the supposed author of the Weekly packet of advice from Rome, 1679 : the second, the answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Gibbon, John, 1629-1718. Day-fatality.
Care, Henry, 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
